channel.title: Purveyor Of Curiosity
channel.description: Recent content on Purveyor Of Curiosity

item.title: Litepuse Is Born
item.description: How business and mission are conducted in the space ecosystem has been static for decades. Progress has been primarily driven by Governmental money and the finicky focus of politics. This has resulted in the stagnation of humanityâ€™s progress toward the stars. The good news is that this dynamic is changing rapidly. With the influx of private capital and focus, we are rapidly evolving the space ecosystem into a more dynamic and efficient organism.
